description: This Python module provides a lightweight, lazy SQLAlchemy engine helper for connecting to a Postgres database using environment variables loaded via python-dotenv. It includes functions to construct a database engine lazily, validate environment variables, and perform a connectivity test when run as a script.

methods.name: _read_env_parts
methods.description: Returns discrete database credential parts from environment variables.

methods.name: _build_url
methods.description: Constructs a Postgres SQLAlchemy URL from environment variables, enforcing SSL mode.

methods.name: get_engine
methods.description: Lazily constructs and returns a SQLAlchemy Engine based on environment variables.

methods.name: _validate_env
methods.description: Checks for the presence of required environment variables; used for validation.
